mapper.select: select * from ticket_datum as a where a.id = #{id}
select * FROM ticket_datum as a where a.REC_STS != 'I' or a.REC_STS IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into ticket_datum ( currency, -- CHAR(6), currency_shorts, -- CHAR(2), currency_symbol, -- CHAR(2), face_value, -- CHAR(2), last_time, -- DATETIME, UDT_TLR, -- CHAR(6), REC_STS, -- CHAR(1) ) VALUES ( #{currency}, -- CHAR(6), #{currency_shorts}, -- CHAR(2), #{currency_symbol}, -- CHAR(2), #{face_value}, -- CHAR(2), #{last_time}, -- DATETIME, #{udt_tlr}, -- CHAR(6), #{rec_sts} -- CHAR(1) )
mapper.update: update ticket_datum SET currency=#{currency}, -- CHAR(6), currency_shorts=#{currency_shorts}, -- CHAR(2), currency_symbol=#{currency_symbol}, -- CHAR(2), face_value=#{face_value}, -- CHAR(2), last_time=#{last_time}, -- DATETIME, UDT_TLR=#{udt_tlr}, -- CHAR(6), REC_STS=#{rec_sts}, -- CHAR(1) WHERE id = #{id} -- numeric(8, 0)
update ticket_datum SET a.REC_STS = 'I' where id=#{id}
